statements: UPDATE payment_transactions SET transaction_amount = 50.0, payment_method = 'credit card' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE payment_transactions SET payment_method = 'paypal', user_id = '876e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' WHERE transaction_id = '456e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE payment_transactions SET payment_method = 'Card' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE payment_transactions SET transaction_amount = 50.75, transaction_time = NOW() WHERE transaction_id = '9a125adf-a139-4c60-9d26-ee5c8f7ec78d';
UPDATE payments SET payment_amount = 1000.00 WHERE payment_id = '6f8a5b37-0706-4e8a-82c0-22d382ec8827';
UPDATE users SET account_balance = 1500.00, username = 'JohnDoe' WHERE user_id = '04e74a6d-0e5e-41e3-ad48-9e409a4b0e50';
UPDATE payments SET payment_amount = 1000.50, payment_time = '2022-03-15 10:30:00', payment_method = 'Credit Card' WHERE payment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET account_balance = account_balance + 500.75, email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
UPDATE payment_transactions SET status = 'success' WHERE transaction_id = 123;
UPDATE customers SET address = '123 Main St.' WHERE customer_id = 456;
UPDATE payment_transactions SET status = 'confirmed', timestamp = '2022-01-31 08:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE customers SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 2002;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 1500 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE customers SET customer_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 2003;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 150.75 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE customers SET customer_email = 'new.email@example.com', customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 2003;
UPDATE payments SET amount = 1500.50 WHERE payment_id = 1021;
UPDATE transactions SET seller_id = 3005, transaction_amount = 750.75 WHERE transaction_id = 5002;
UPDATE payments SET amount = 500.00, payment_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE payment_id = 101;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 150.75, transaction_date = '2022-07-20' WHERE seller_id = 201 AND payment_id = 101;
